trans-unit.source: Provides a type-safe way to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByParams*> property.
trans-unit.target: 提供以类型安全的方式来设置<xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByParams*>属性。</xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByParams*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByParams%2A> property identifies which HTTP `Get` or `Post` parameters ASP.NET uses to uniquely identify a variation of the response when there are multiple cached responses for a resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByParams%2A>属性标识 HTTP`Get`或`Post`ASP.NET 用于唯一标识的响应变体，当有多个缓存的响应的资源时的参数。</xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByParams%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when a response depends on a set of client inputs, such as headers or parameters.
trans-unit.target: 当响应依赖于一组客户端输入，例如标头或参数时，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The HttpCacheVaryByParams is not directly related to HTTP cache-control headers, but helps ensure that a client or proxy varies by the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 与 HTTP 缓存控制标头，不直接相关 HttpCacheVaryByParams 但有助于确保客户端或代理因指定的参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `VaryByParams`, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125) site.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`VaryByParams`，请参阅 RFC 2616︰ 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)站点。

trans-unit.source: See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅完整的详细信息部分 14 中，"标头字段定义"。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.HttpCacheVaryByParams"></xref> class.

Gets an array of values which specify the HTTP <xref uid="langword_csharp_GET" name="GET" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_POST" name="POST" href=""></xref> parameters to be used for varying the cache.
trans-unit.target: 获取数组的值指定 HTTP <xref uid="langword_csharp_GET" name="GET" href=""> </xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_POST" name="POST" href=""></xref>参数要用于改变缓存。

trans-unit.source: An array of values which contain the HTTP <xref uid="langword_csharp_GET" name="GET" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_POST" name="POST" href=""></xref> parameters for varying the cache.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，其中包含 HTTP 数组<xref uid="langword_csharp_GET" name="GET" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_POST" name="POST" href=""></xref>用于改变缓存的参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an HTTP response varies by <xref uid="langword_csharp_Get" name="Get" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Post" name="Post" href=""></xref> parameters.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值的 HTTP 响应因<xref uid="langword_csharp_Get" name="Get" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_Post" name="Post" href=""></xref>参数。

trans-unit.source: Setting the IgnoreParams property to `true` is equivalent to setting the [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive `VaryByParams` attribute to "none" for the resource.
trans-unit.target: 将 IgnoreParams 属性设置为`true`等效于设置[@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指令`VaryByParams`属性设为"none"的资源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if HTTP request parameters are ignored; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果忽略 HTTP 请求参数;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cache varies according to the specified HTTP request parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否缓存会根据指定的 HTTP 请求参数而不同。

trans-unit.source: When used as an accessor (getter), the Item indexer returns `true` if a value for the specified parameter is found in the current parameters collection, or if the collection is set to vary by * (an asterisk), which indicates all parameters. When used as a mutator (setter), the Item indexer sets the value for the parameter in the parameters collection that corresponds to the specified header to `true`. The value * can be specified, which indicates all parameters.
trans-unit.target: 当用作访问器 (getter)，返回的项索引器`true`如果在当前的参数集合中，找到指定的参数的值或集合设置为因*（星号） 指示所有参数。 当使用作为赋值函数 (setter) 的项索引器参数的值中设置对应的参数集合为指定的标头到`true`。值*可以指定，它指示所有参数。

trans-unit.source: The name of the custom parameter.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cache should vary by the specified parameter value.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果缓存应因指定的参数值。

trans-unit.source: Sets an array of values which specify the HTTP <xref uid="langword_csharp_GET" name="GET" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_POST" name="POST" href=""></xref> parameters to be used for varying the cache.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值指定 HTTP 的数组<xref uid="langword_csharp_GET" name="GET" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_POST" name="POST" href=""></xref>参数要用于改变缓存。

trans-unit.source: An array of values which contain the HTTP <xref uid="langword_csharp_GET" name="GET" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_POST" name="POST" href=""></xref> parameters for varying the cache.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，其中包含 HTTP 数组<xref uid="langword_csharp_GET" name="GET" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_POST" name="POST" href=""></xref>用于改变缓存的参数。
